text:
Any of these alone is unlikely to be a sign or symptom of shock.
                
If you or someone else is having these signs and symptoms, call 911 right away for emergency treatment. Prompt medical care can save your life and prevent or limit organ damage.",NHLBI,Cardiogenic Shock
How to diagnose Cardiogenic Shock ?,"The first step in diagnosing cardiogenic shock is to identify that a person is in shock. At that point, emergency treatment should begin.
